item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: January 27, 2026 Today's Verse 1 John 3:2 [2] Beloved, we are Godâ€™s children now, and what we will be has not yet appeared; but we know that when he appears we shall be like him, because we shall see him as he is. Today's Memory Verse Isaiah 40:28 - Have you not known? Have you not heard? The Lord is the everlasting God, the Creator of the ends of the earth.
